column4: alright, I can't figure out what I need to use the crypt command... O_o there's no package named crypt that I can install, and the package search results are not helpful
if you type crypt in the terminal and you don't have it, it will tell you what package to install
The program 'crypt' is currently not installed.  You can install it by typing: sudo apt-get install mcrypt
thanks, I don't have that on my server
